long_description: A miniature messenger bag with nostalgic styling, a basic design and room for the essentials, the Timbuk2 Embarcadero Messenger Bag offers enough room for an iPad in a bike-friendly design. Timbuk2 Embarcadero Messenger Bag features an internal padded pocket that stores your iPad or tablet. Zippered organizer pocket secures small items; key fob clips your keys so you never have to dig for them. Blinky-light attachment point; quick-adjust mini cam buckle; secure rip-and-stick closure. Closeout.
short_description: A miniature messenger bag with nostalgic styling, a basic design and room for the essentials, the Timbuk2 Embarcadero Messenger Bag offers enough room for an iPad in a bike-friendly design.
